Name: Death Ski
About the game: Ski ace Roger Knightley is training slalom this winter. Beyond the hostile environment and dangerous wildlife, something far worse awaits him on the deadly slopes. 60 challenging levels of retro skiing action. Slalom courses, time trials and more. Avalanches, charging deer, packs of wolves, grizzly bears, chainsaw-wielding maniacs and psychotic goats are just some of the hazards you shall encounter.
